name: Training of plant operators and maintenace staff
description:
The training includes three training sessions for two weeks each and two operators of the filling plant in Germany and will be executed once per year according to agreements between the plant management in Bangladesh and FAS GmbH in Germany.

Included in the training costs are

- ten days (8 hours each) from Monday to Friday at FAS facilities in Salzgitter, Germany
- accommodation for two weeks (13 nights)
- lunch at the company
- transportation between company and flat
- training material as manuals and files

Not included are 
- flights and transportation between the airport and Salzgitter, Germany
- breakfast and dinner meals

The training will be executed by experts at the premises in Germany and will teach the operators on an efficient plant operation and the proper maintenance and service.
